title: 51st: With Democrats In Charge, Is DC Destined For Statehood?
dc:creator: Mikaela Lefrak
description: The city's chances at statehood have improved in 2021, but there’s still one big obstacle: the filibuster. This is a special bonus episode of 51st, from WAMU's What's With Washington. To support the show, visit wamu.org/supportwhatswith.
itunes:subtitle:
The citys chances at statehood have improved in 2021, but there’s still one big obstacle: the filibuster.

This is a special bonus episode of 51st, from WAMUs Whats With Washington. To support the show, visit wamu.org/supportwhatswith.
